name: State and county co-sponsorship of programs
text: [§115-7]  State and county co-sponsorship of programs.  The department of land and natural resources shall enter into agreements with the council of any county providing for the acquisition of public rights-of-way and public transit corridors pursuant to this chapter; provided that the county shall match the funds which have been appropriated by the legislature.  The development and maintenance of the rights-of-way and public transit corridors shall be the responsibility of the county. [L 1974, c 244, §7]
